Description.Text: Regal Riverside Hotel is a 1,138-room hotel set amid the greenery Shatin with walking distance to New Town Shopping Plaza and well-connected to Kowloons TsimShaTsui shopping, entertainment and business district. The neighbourhood also features a cluster of mega malls with an immense variety of brand boutiques as well as a myriad of individually operated shops and dining and entertainment options.

Hotel set amid the greenery Shatin with walking distance to New Town Shopping Plaza and well-connected to Kowloon?s TsimShaTsui shopping, entertainment and business district. Greater Sha Tin features many places of interest, including the 10,000 Buddha Temple, the Hong Kong Heritage Museum and the famous Sha Tin Racecourse.

The rooms are equipped with full range of modern amenities with special vantage point overlooking the gorgeous river. These spacious accommodations measure up to 34 square metres and feature comfortable working station with two double beds.

The hotel is a hub of dining and nightlife, offering a fine selection of 8 great restaurants and 2 superb bars under one roof. From candlelight dinners to gourmet sushi, and from Cantonese delicacies to a beer with friends, the hotel has something for everyone.
Large lobby with 24 hour reception and concierge services.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Rates not valid during fair periods.Late cancellation and no show will be charged fee equivalent to one night for each room room cancelled or unutilized. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. In-house movie (Pay movies service) is no longer exist at all Regal hotels in Hong Kong IMPORTANT NOTE : Regal Riverside Hotel is a totally smoke-free hotel from 1 June 2019 onwards.
